alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 1:25PM EST until further notice by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Black River At Elyria affecting Lorain County. For the Black River...including Elyria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River At Elyria. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, flooding will occur along the East Branch of the Black River on Foster Road in Penfield Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 2.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 14.0 feet early Friday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.1 feet on 01/19/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1130 PM EST.
